cqs: How many things could c1 do with something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many things may c1 do with something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many relations exist between c1 and something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many things can c1 do with something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many relations are described between c1 and something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many relations are available between c1 and something that op2 nothing but c2?
How many relations are there between c1 and something that op2 nothing but c2?
query: SELECT (COUNT(?x) AS ?cnt) WHERE { <c1> rdfs:subClassOf [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty ?x ; owl:someValuesFrom [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty <op2> ; owl:allValuesFrom <c2> ] ] . }
